description: Dashboard for Grafana K6 load test monitoring, troubleshooting and reporting. As concise and minimal as possible, whilst including critical data points. It includes metrics for both Protocol (http_...) and Browser (browser_...) tests. It includes Groups (Transactions) for protocol level testing.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "http_reqs" and
    r._field == "value"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> count()

//SELECT min("value") as "Min", mean("value")-min("value") as "Avg", percentile("value", 95)-mean("value") as "p95", max("value")- percentile("value", 95) as "Max" FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter

// 1. MIN
minVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> group()
  |> min()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, Min: r._value }))

// 2. MEAN
meanVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, Mean: r._value }))

// 3. P95
p95Val = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> group()
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, P95: r._value }))

// 4. MAX
maxVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> group()
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, Max: r._value }))

// Step 1: Join min + mean
minMean = join(tables: {min: minVal, mean: meanVal}, on: ["_time"])

// Step 2: Join result with p95
minMeanP95 = join(tables: {left: minMean, right: p95Val}, on: ["_time"])

// Step 3: Join result with max
allStats = join(tables: {left: minMeanP95, right: maxVal}, on: ["_time"])

// Final mapping
allStats
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    "1_Min": r.Min,
    "2_Avg": r.Mean - r.Min,
    "3_p95": r.P95 - r.Mean,
    "4_Max": r.Max - r.P95
  }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and
    r._field == "value"
  )
  |> group()
  |> histogram(
    column: "_value",
    upperBoundColumn: "le",
    countColumn: "count",
    bins: [3.0, 4.0, 10.0, 20.0, 40.0, 80.0, 160.0, 10000.0]
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["le", "count"])

minValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "A Min" }))

meanValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "B Mean" }))

p95Values = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(column: "_value", every: $__interval, fn: (column, tables=<-) => tables |> quantile(q: 0.95, column: column, method: "estimate_tdigest"), createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "C P95" }))

maxValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "D Max" }))

union(tables: [minValues, meanValues,p95Values, maxValues])
  |> group(columns: ["phase"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "Response Breakdown")

sending = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_sending" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "Request Sending" }))

waiting = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_waiting" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "Request Waiting" }))

receiving = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_receiving" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "Request Receiving" }))

duration = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "Total Duration" }))

union(tables: [sending, waiting, receiving, duration])
  |> group(columns: ["phase"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "Request Breakdown + Total")

//SELECT min("value") as "Min", mean("value")-min("value") as "Avg", percentile("value", 95)-mean("value") as "p95", max("value")- percentile("value", 95) as "Max" FROM "group_duration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "group" =~/^$Transaction$/

// 1. MIN
minVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> group()
  |> min()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, Min: r._value }))

// 2. MEAN
meanVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, Mean: r._value }))

// 3. P95
p95Val = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> group()
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, P95: r._value }))

// 4. MAX
maxVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> group()
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, Max: r._value }))

// Step 1: Join min + mean
minMean = join(tables: {min: minVal, mean: meanVal}, on: ["_time"])

// Step 2: Join result with p95
minMeanP95 = join(tables: {left: minMean, right: p95Val}, on: ["_time"])

// Step 3: Join result with max
allStats = join(tables: {left: minMeanP95, right: maxVal}, on: ["_time"])

// Final mapping
allStats
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    Min: r.Min,
    Avg: r.Mean - r.Min,
    p95: r.P95 - r.Mean,
    Max: r.Max - r.P95
  }))

minValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "group_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))

maxValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "group_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "D Max" }))

union(tables: [minValues, meanValues, p95Values, maxValues])
  |> group(columns: ["phase"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "Response Breakdown")

minValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "A Min" }))

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "B Mean" }))

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(column: "_value", every: $__interval, fn: (column, tables=<-) => tables |> quantile(q: 0.95, column: column, method: "estimate_tdigest"), createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "C P95" }))

maxValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "D Max" }))

union(tables: [minValues, meanValues, p95Values, maxValues])
  |> group(columns: ["phase"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "Response Breakdown")

//SELECT min("value") as "Min", mean("value")-min("value") as "Avg", percentile("value", 95)-mean("value") as "p95", max("value")- percentile("value", 95) as "Max" FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/

// 1. MIN
minVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> group()
  |> min()

// 2. MEAN
meanVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")

// 3. P95

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> group()
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, P95: r._value }))

// 4. MAX
maxVal = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> group()
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: v.timeRangeStop, Max: r._value }))

// Step 1: Join min + mean

// Step 2: Join result with p95

// Step 3: Join result with max

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    "1_Min": r.Min,
    "2_Avg": r.Mean - r.Min,
    "3_p95": r.P95 - r.Mean,
    "4_Max": r.Max - r.P95
  }))

//SELECT max("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
//SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
//SELECT min("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

minValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "A Min" }))

meanValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "B Mean" }))

p95Values = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(column: "_value", every: $__interval, fn: (column, tables=<-) => tables |> quantile(q: 0.95, column: column, method: "estimate_tdigest"), createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "B P95" }))

maxValues = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "D Max" }))

union(tables: [minValues, meanValues, p95Values, maxValues])
  |> group(columns: ["phase"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "Response Breakdown")

//SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
//SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_sending" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_waiting" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
//SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_receiving" WHERE $timeFilter and "group" =~/^$Transaction$/ and "name" =~/^$URL$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

sending = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_sending" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))

waiting = from(bucket: v.bucket)

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "Request Waiting" }))

receiving = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_receiving" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "Request Receiving" }))

duration = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration" and r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with phase: "Total Duration" }))

union(tables: [sending, waiting, receiving, duration])
  |> group(columns: ["phase"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "Request Breakdown + Total")

panels.title: HTTP Request (can filter by transaction and url)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "browser_web_vital_lcp" WHERE ("name"::tag =~ /^$PageURL/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "browser_web_vital_inp" WHERE ("name"::tag =~ /^$PageURL/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "browser_web_vital_cls" WHERE ("name"::tag =~ /^$PageURL/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "browser_web_vital_fcp" WHERE ("name"::tag =~ /^$PageURL/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "browser_web_vital_ttfb" WHERE ("name"::tag =~ /^$PageURL/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "browser_web_vital_fid" WHERE ("name"::tag =~ /^$PageURL/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") as "CLS" FROM browser_web_vital_cls WHERE $timeFilter  and "name" =~ /^$PageURL/ group by "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") as "FCP" FROM browser_web_vital_fcp WHERE $timeFilter  and "name" =~ /^$PageURL/ group by "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") as "FID" FROM browser_web_vital_fid WHERE $timeFilter  and "name" =~ /^$PageURL/ group by "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") as "INP" FROM browser_web_vital_inp WHERE $timeFilter  and "name" =~ /^$PageURL/ group by "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") as "LCP" FROM browser_web_vital_lcp WHERE $timeFilter  and "name" =~ /^$PageURL/ group by "name" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") as "TTFB" FROM browser_web_vital_ttfb WHERE $timeFilter  and "name" =~ /^$PageURL/ group by "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Core Web Vitals by Page URL
Core Web Vitals (can filter by page URL)

targets.query: SELECT count("value") as "Count", min("value") as "Min", mean("value") as "Avg", percentile("value", 95) as "p95", max("value") as "Max" FROM group_duration WHERE $timeFilter and ("group"::tag =~ /^$Transaction$/) GROUP BY "group"

SELECT count("value") as "Count", min("value") as "Min", mean("value") as "Avg", max("value") as "Max", percentile("value", 95) as "p95" FROM http_req_duration WHERE $timeFilter AND ("group"::tag =~ /^$Transaction$/) AND ("name" =~ /^$URL$/) GROUP BY "group", "name"

panels.title: Requests Response Times (can filter by transction and url)
Response Times Tables (can filter by transaction and url)
Errors and Checks (can filter by transaction and url)

targets.query:
//SELECT "group", "method", "name", "status", "error_code", "value" FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE $timeFilter AND error_code != '' AND "group" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "name" =~ /^$URL$/ 

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "http_req_failed" and
    r._field == "value" and
    r.error_code != ""
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.name, set: ${URL:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["group", "method", "name", "status", "error_code", "_time", "_value"])
  |> group()

panels.title: HTTP Request Errors (can filter by transaction and url)

targets.query:
//SELECT "value" FROM "checks" WHERE $timeFilter AND "group" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "value" = 0 GROUP BY "check", "group"

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "checks" and
    r._field == "value" and
    r._value == 0
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.group, set: ${Transaction:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "group"])
  |> group()

list.name: Transaction

list.label: URL
list.name: URL
